(min-width:40.625rem){.horizontal-rule-tablet{clear:both;border:0;display:block;width:100%;margin:1rem 0 0}}@media only screen and (min-width:61.25rem){.feed-grid{padding-left:2.5rem;padding-right:2.5rem}}.grid-simple-item{clear:both;margin:1.25rem 0}@media only screen and -grootverdieners-van-het-instagramland-zoveel-verdienen-ze-per-post/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":15,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/leven-liefde/a22571362/wat-we-kunnen-leren-van-gay-mannen/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":16,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22576171/gwyneth-paltrow-ontkent-becky-with-the-good-hair-beyonce-jay-z/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":17,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22576448/meghan-markle-goedkeuring-priyanka-chopra-verloving-nick-jonas/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":18,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/interieur/g22570753/verkoelen-afkoelen-hitte-interieur-zomer/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":19,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/beauty-health/beauty-health-nieuws/a22572997/rihanna-bob-kapseltrend-haar/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":20,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/films-tv/a22571809/kristen-stewart-naomi-scott-ella-balinska-charlies-angels-reboot-cast/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":21,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22569442/record-warmste-dag-ooit-hittegolf-nederland/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":22,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22569261/leukste-events-pride-amsterdam-2018/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":23,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/g22569878/royals-verschijnen-in-betaalbare-kleding/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":24,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22087044/inspiratie-dit-zijn-de-lekkerste-mocktails/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":25,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22568630/langste-maansverduistering-bloedmaan-van-de-eeuw/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":26,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/wedding/wedding-nieuws/a22570067/priyanka-chopra-nick-jonas-verloofd/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":27,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22569367/jenna-dewan-naakt-cover-womens-health/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":28,"url":"//www.elle.com/nl/mode/mode-nieuws/a22569629/meg   </head>
  <body class="locale-nl homepage">
   <header class="marquee bg-image lazyload lazyload-in-view homepage-marquee only-marquee video-marquee">
    <div class="marquee-overlay">
    </div>
    <div class="marquee-inner">
     <video autoplay="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hmg.h-cdn.co/videos/marquee-augustus-2-1532520433.mp4" loop="" muted="">

     <div class="marquee-content">

       <a class="marquee-logo-link" href="/nl/">

     <div class="top-pathing-inner">
      <div class="simple-item top-pathing-item show-numbers">
       <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Gwyneth Paltrow niet 'Becky with the good hair'" data-vars-ga-position="1" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22576171/gwyneth-paltrow-ontkent-becky-with-the-good-hair-beyonce-jay-z/">

        <div class="top-pathing-label">
         Meest gelezen artikelen
        </div>
       </a>
       <div class="simple-item-index">
        1
       </div>
       <div class="top-pathing-item-wrap">
        <a class="simple-item-title item-title" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Gwyneth Paltrow niet 'Becky with the good hair'" data-vars-ga-position="1" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22576171/gwyneth-paltrow-ontkent-becky-with-the-good-hair-beyonce-jay-z/">
         Gwyneth Paltrow niet 'Becky with the good hair'
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="simple-item top-pathing-item show-numbers">
       <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Meghan Markle blij met verloving Priyanka en Nick" data-vars-ga-position="2" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/nl/lifestyle/lifestyle-nieuws/a22576448/meghan-markle-goedkeuring-priyanka-chopra-verloving-nick-jonas/">

        Lifestyle
       </a>
       <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="DD/MM/YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-07-29T14:00:00Z">
        29/07/2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/nl/lifestyle/g22573677/bangs-haircut-before-after-photos/">
        Dit Instagramaccount zorgt ervoor dat je zo snel mogelijk een pony wilt
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Haast je naar de kapper.
        </p>
       </div>

     <div class="full-item ">
      <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/nl/leven-liefde/a22571362/wat-we-kunnen-leren-van-gay-mannen/">
       <img alt="Wat we nog kunnen leren van gay mensen" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gay-koppel-1532698480.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gay-koppel-1532698480.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Wat we nog kunnen leren van gay mensen"/>
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-metadata">
       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/nl/leven-liefde/">
        Leven &amp; Liefde
       </a>
       <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="DD/MM/YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-07-28T05:00:00Z">
        28/07/2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/nl/leven-liefde/a22571362/wat-we-kunnen-leren-van-gay-mannen/">
        Wat we kunnen leren van gay mannen
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Heteros gaan uit van monogamie, homos zijn wijzer.
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
        Door
        <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">

       </a>

     <div class="full-item ">
      <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/nl/wedding/wedding-nieuws/a22570067/priyanka-chopra-nick-jonas-verloofd/">

      </a>

       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/nl/wedding/wedding-nieuws/">
        Nieuws

       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/nl/wedding/wedding-nieuws/a22570067/priyanka-chopra-nick-jonas-verloofd/">

       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Na twee maanden daten. Wij spotten een trend...
        </p>

    ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
 	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
 		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
 		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage.75201a3.css"],
 		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage-mobile.3791eb6.css"];
 
 		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
 			l = d.createElement( "link" );
 			l.rel = "stylesheet";
 			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];
 
 			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
 		}
 	} );
 } )( document, Modernizr );
   </script>

 	var s = document.createElement( "script" );
 
 	s.async = true;
 
 				var evidonWithdraw = d.cookie.match("[;]*\s*_evidon_consent_withdrawn\s*=\s*([^;]+)");
 
 		if (evidonWithdraw && (evidonWithdraw[1] - (Date.now() - 43200000)) < 0) {
 		d.cookie = "_evidon_consent_withdrawn=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; path=/";
 		evidonWithdraw = false;
 	}
 
 		if (!evidonWithdraw) {
 		var id=5278,append=function(n,o,e){var i=document,t="script",d=i.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];d||(d=i.head);var a=i.createElement(t);a.async=!0,a.id=n,a.src=o,d.parentNode.insertBefore(a,d)},getRootDomain=function(){var n=window.location.hostname.split(".");if(2===n.length)rootDomain=n[0];else if(n.length>2){var o=n[n.length-2];rootDomain="com"===o||"co"===o?n[n.length-3]:o}return rootDomain},cdn="//c.evidon.com/",rootDomain=getRootDomain(),noticecdn=cdn+"sitenotice/";window.evidon={},window.evidon.id=id,append("evidon-notice",noticecdn+"evidon-sitenotice-tag.js",!1),append("evidon-location",cdn+"geo/country.js",!0),append("evidon-themes",noticecdn+id+"/snthemes.js",!0),rootDomain&&append("evidon-settings",noticecdn+id+"/"+rootDomain+"/settings.js",!0),window.evidon.priorConsentCallback=function(){window.evidon.barrier&&location.reload()},window.evidon.closeCallback=window.evidon.consentWithdrawnCallback=window.evidon.consentDeclinedCallback=function(){document.cookie="_evidon_consent_withdrawn=" + Date.now() + "; expires=" + new Date(Date.now() + 31536000000).toUTCString() + "; path=/" };
 	}
 
 		if ( d.cookie.indexOf( "_evidon_consent_cookie" ) > -1 ) {
 		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-nl/Bootstrap.js";
 	} else {
 		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-nl-dnt/Bootstrap.js";
 	}
 	
 	if ( d.cookie.indexOf( "nsghtn=dev" ) > -1 ) {
 		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-nl-dev/Bootstrap.js";
 	}
 
 	d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ].appendChild( s );
 } )( document );
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
